title: Apple goes 5G, the Feds want to break up Google Chrome, and Fareed Zakaria on lessons from 2020
summary:
Kara and Scott talk about Apple's iPhone event and the future of 5G. They also discuss a potential plan from the federal government to break apart Google Chrome. In Friend of Pivot, we hear from author Fareed Zakaria about lessons from the pandemic.
